Commitment from the Top — Steering 
Committee led by Chairman & CEO
The Company’s pledge to always be at the 
forefront of the industry’s gaming efforts 
comes from the very top. Our Responsible 
Gaming Steering Committee, set up in 2008, is 
personally led by Lawrence Ho, our Chairman 
and CEO, who is its Executive Sponsor. Our 
RG strategy and its policies are implemented 
globally in all jurisdictions in which we operate, 
subject to local regulations. 
Our gaming and non-gaming departments 
as well as global executive leaders, including 
Property Presidents and our Chief Operating 
Officer (COO), are represented on this 
Committee. Through quarterly meetings, 
the Committee provides strategic direction 
for all our RG initiatives. Separate working 
committees meet more regularly to propose 
and implement initiatives that ensure we
